casebody.data:
SETTLERS EDGE HOLDING COMPANY, LLC; Mountain Air Development Corporation; Virginia A. Banks; William R. Banks ; Jeani H. Banks; Michael R. Watson ; Sheree B. Watson; Virginia A. Banks, William R. Banks, and Sheree B. Watson in their capacity as Trustees of William A. Banks Revocable Trust; Morris Atkins in his capacity as Trustee of William Banks Family Irrevocable Trust Number 1; and Morris Atkins in his capacity as Trustee of William Banks Family Irrevocable Trust Number 2
v.
RES-NC SETTLERS EDGE, LLC No. 17P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 16, 2017 G. Kirkland Hardymon, Attorney at Law, Ross R. Fulton, Attorney at Law, Benjamin E. Shook, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Settlers Edge Holding Company, LLC, et al. Christopher Blake, Attorney at Law, D. Martin Warf, Attorney at Law, Leslie L. Mize, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for RES-NC Settlers Edge, LLC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 11th of January 2017 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."
